transformations.name: Employee
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

transformations.name: Domains
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> RawEmployees
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> RawDomains
RawEmployees derive(emp_id = toString(byName('id')),
		emp_email_address = toString(byName('email_address')),
		emp_exit_date = toString(byName('exit_date')),
		emp_active = toString(byName('active')),
		emp_domain_id = toString(byName('domain_id')),
		emp_user_id = toString(byName('user_id')),
		emp_created_at = toString(byName('created_at')),
		emp_updated_at = toString(byName('updated_at')),
		emp_mailbox_user_id = toString(byName('mailbox_user_id')),
		emp_last_call_success = toString(byName('last_call_success')),
		emp_time_zone = toString(byName('time_zone')),
		emp_locale = toString(byName('locale')),
		emp_admin = toString(byName('admin')),
		emp_is_list = toString(byName('is_list')),
		emp_entry_date = toString(byName('entry_date')),
		emp_user_unique_id = toString(byName('user_unique_id')),
		emp_parent_id = toString(byName('parent_id')),
		emp_country = toString(byName('country')),
		emp_language = toString(byName('language')),
		emp_encrypted_email_address = toString(byName('encrypted_email_address')),
		emp_working_time = toString(byName('working_time')),
		emp_is_api_available = toString(byName('is_api_available')),
		emp_behaviors_group_id = toString(byName('behaviors_group_id')),
		emp_analytics_end_date = toString(byName('analytics_end_date')),
		emp_analytics_start_date = toString(byName('analytics_start_date')),
		emp_analytics_data_extraction_done = toString(byName('analytics_data_extraction_done')),
		emp_smart_deconnexion_country_code = toString(byName('smart_deconnexion_country_code')),
		emp_force_unactive = toString(byName('force_unactive')),
		emp_data_extracted_until = toString(byName('data_extracted_until')),
		emp_directory_type = toString(byName('directory_type')),
		emp_is_directory_ressource_account = toString(byName('is_directory_ressource_account'))) ~> Employee
Employee select(mapColumn(
		emp_id,
		emp_email_address,
		emp_exit_date,
		emp_active,
		emp_domain_id,
		emp_user_id,
		emp_created_at,
		emp_updated_at,
		emp_mailbox_user_id,
		emp_last_call_success,
		emp_time_zone,
		emp_locale,
		emp_admin,
		emp_is_list,
		emp_entry_date,
		emp_user_unique_id,
		emp_parent_id,
		emp_country,
		emp_language,
		emp_encrypted_email_address,
		emp_working_time,
		emp_is_api_available,
		emp_behaviors_group_id,
		emp_analytics_end_date,
		emp_analytics_start_date,
		emp_analytics_data_extraction_done,
		emp_smart_deconnexion_country_code,
		emp_force_unactive,
		emp_data_extracted_until,
		emp_directory_type,
		emp_is_directory_ressource_account
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> employeesWithSelect
RawDomains derive(dom_id = toString(byName('id')),
		dom_url = toString(byName('url')),
		dom_company_id = toString(byName('company_id'))) ~> Domains
Domains select(mapColumn(
		dom_id,
		dom_url,
		dom_company_id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> domainsWithSelect
employeesWithSelect, domainsWithSelect join(emp_domain_id == dom_id,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinEmployeeWithDomain
JoinEmployeeWithDomain sink(input(
		{id	url	company_id	created_at	updated_at} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> employeeWithDomains

transformations.name: mappedEmailRecipients
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> RawEmailRecipient
RawEmailRecipient derive(er_id = toString(byName('id')),
		er_recipient_id = toString(byName('recipient_id')),
		er_email_id = toString(byName('email_id')),
		er_status = toString(byName('status')),
		er_created_at = toString(byName('updated_at')),
		er_updated_at = toString(byName('updated_at')),
		er_through_list = toString(byName('through_list')),
		er_read_delay = toString(byName('read_delay')),
		er_mailbox_message_id = toString(byName('mailbox_message_id')),
		er_is_read = toString(byName('is_read')),
		er_read_time = toString(byName('read_time')),
		er_delivered_date = toString(byName('delivered_date'))) ~> mappedEmailRecipients
mappedEmailRecipients sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	truncate: true) ~> byRecipientSink
